home.title: TauRent
home.subtitle: Mobile application for ski and tourist equipment rental
home.description: TauRent is a client mobile application that allows users to book ski and tourist equipment from verified rental stores in Almaty. The application serves as a CRM system for these stores, making the rental process easier and allowing users to quickly find the necessary equipment.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of enthusiasts who love active recreation and want to make equipment rental as convenient as possible for everyone.

project.title: About Project
project.functionality: What you can do in the TauRent application:
features: View a list of rental shops (e.g., Skadi, Tobe, Shangy, ShymbulakRent, etc.)
Select equipment by categories: skis, snowboard, tent, bicycle, sleeping pad, etc.
Sort stores by reviews — the best offers are displayed first
Book both individual items and ready-made combo sets (e.g., skis + boots + helmet)
Pay for the rent in full or make a 20% prepayment
Receive a unique booking code with order information and a countdown timer until the end of the rental period
Rate and leave reviews on specific products or combos in each store
Authorize by name, phone number, and email
nav_items: Home (ski icon) — category selection, store list, product selection
Active bookings (REC icon) — current booking, history, code, and timer
Profile (person icon) — user data, account logout
future_plans: Integration with Almaty map for convenient search of the nearest pickup points
Ability to add product photos via API
Development of a CRM version for stores with warehouse and order management
